headline: Fox (FOXA) Margin Decline Reinforces Focus on Value Despite Slower Forecast Growth
summary: Fox (FOXA) reported a net profit margin of 12.4%, down from 13.4% last year, highlighting a year-over-year decline in profitability. Over the past five years, earnings grew at an average rate of 3.8% annually. The latest year saw a 5.9% increase, which outpaced the long-term average. Despite near-term forecasts showing revenue growth of just 1.1% per year and only a 0.2% rise in earnings, the company’s stock trades at $64.65. This is notably below its estimated fair value of $113.5. Fox also...
